description:
I am running OpenStack Mitaka on CentOS7.1 with Citrix XenServer 6.5.
In function create_image() of nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py file, the following function documentation string:

    """Creates VDI from the image stored in the local cache. If the image
    is not present in the cache, it streams it from glance.

    Returns: A list of dictionaries that describe VDIs
    """

According to context, I think 'it' word in 'it streams it from glance' sentence should be cancelled
title: code comment redundant

comments.content:
I am running OpenStack Mitaka on CentOS7.1 with Citrix XenServer 6.5.
In function create_image() of nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py file, the following function documentation string:

    """Creates VDI from the image stored in the local cache. If the image
    is not present in the cache, it streams it from glance.

    Returns: A list of dictionaries that describe VDIs
    """

According to context, I think 'it' word in 'it streams it from glance' sentence should be cancelled
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhoujm-cri

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/450520
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
